text:
Chimborazo is a province in Ecuador. The capital is Riobamba.
It is a home to a section of Sangay National Park. The province has Chimborazo (6,267 m), Ecuador's highest mountain.
Cantons.
The province is divided into 10 cantons. The following table lists each with its population at the time of the 2001 census, its area in square kilometres (km²), and the name of the canton seat or capital.
